posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/e8/84/Ff3uYbI1_o.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/EEflOvL.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]BYTES PER POST INCREASED[/b][/color]
[mention=1] announced an increase in bytes earned through posting. With this change, users will now receive 3 bytes per post instead of 1. Upgraded members will still see an increase in bytes earned based on their tier. Leet members will receive 4.5 bytes per post, while Ub3R members will receive 6 bytes per post. You can learn more about this and other bytes reward increases by viewing his thread [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6253697][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]E-WHORING REBRANDED[/b][/color]
During Octoberfest we received an update which resulted in the E-Whoring section being rebranded to [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=170]Adult Content Management[/url]. The fIcon which has been used for years was also replaced with a new design. You can view the announcement and discussions on these changes by checking out [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6253543][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]CREW USERBARS UPDATE[/b][/color]
A recent change to custom crew userbars has increased the max file size from 60k to 150k. This is intended to help incentivize members to upgrade their images or even rebrand the entire crew. You can see the post announcing this update by clicking [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6252933][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]USER NEWS[/b][/color]

[mention=2119467] has received the [award=63] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=63]Sticky Man[/url] award for his [url= 	https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6231111]guide on the cardiovascular system and electrocardiograms.[/url]
[mention=2119467] has received the [award=2] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=2]White Hat Helper[/url] award for his efforts in the [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=262]Health Wise[/url] section.
[mention=123] has received the [award=29] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=29]Silver Medal[/url] award for giving away [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6253212]free L33T  upgrades.[/url]
[mention=666] has received the [award=153] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=153]MAGA's of the Universe[/url] award.
[mention=230053] has received the [award=91] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=91]Music Lover[/url] award.
[mention=5002443] has received the [award=62] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=62]Qwazz Star[/url] and [award=127] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=127]iHydra[/url] awards.
[mention=18] has received the [award=159] [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=159]Infamous Delta[/url] award.

[mention=666] and [mention=5002443] have reached 5,000 posts.
[mention=3995095] has reached 2,000 popularity points.
[mention=666] has reached 3,000 positive b-ratings without a negative rating.

[mention=18] and [mention=5185438] have been appointed as [url=https://hackforums.net/convo.php]HF Convo[/url] moderators.

[color=#ffffff][b]BANS & CLOSURES[/b][/color]

[mention=2682887] was closed for scamming a member for $8,000.
[mention=5307571] was closed for scamming members.
[mention=4362613] was banned for excessive deal disputes.
[mention=801999] received a 2-day ban for making false reports.
Many ban-evading fatties were banned and closed during the month of October as well.

[color=#ffffff][b]VACATIONS[/b][/color]
[mention=317107] took a 1-month vacation ban.
[mention=1363555] took a 1-month vacation ban.
[mention=5051324] took a 1-month vacation ban.

[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/18/99/IMMXY9bI_o.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][img]https://i.gyazo.com/30a36e69e88b523daa8c8f1bca5f8d4d.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]AWARD PRICE INCREASED[/b][/color]
The Bytes Bag [award=164] is about to get a bit more expensive. An announcement was made that the award as of November 1st will be re-valued at 30,000 bytes. With the announcement, it was also mentioned that the price would continue to increase over time. More of an incentive to go ahead and purchase the award now while it is still cheap. And with the recent updates in bytes per post, it's easier now than before. You can read the thread discussing the change [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6253533][i]here[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]CAPTCHA REMOVED[/b][/color]
After several users discussed complications due to Cloudflare Captcha, the decision was made to remove the Captcha. This should make posting and replying to PM's easier for newer members. These changes may revert back if it proves to be problematic. You can find more information in [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6254110][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]WARNING LEVEL CHANGES[/b][/color]

Some changes were made to the Warning System in order to be a little less harsh than before. Posting limitation times have been reduced along with a decreased ban lengths. You can view the list of warnings, their values and effects by taking a look at [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6253534][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature.[/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6252861][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/42/5f/n5Mnml1G_o.png[/img][/url][/align]
